content: this supper easy simple and quick pattern was inspired by coffee and cream 1 s knitted catnip bunny pattern 2 when i first saw them i fell in love what a lovely rainbow of bunnies unfortunately i do not know how to knit yet so i decided to make a crochet version thank you selina 3 for this lovely idea sharing it and letting me share the crochet version for those of us who do not knit **main materials and tools ** 1 acrylic cotton or bamboo yarn in addition small amount of 2 other colous for the eyes & muzzle 2 hook size 2 5mm 3 stuffing material 4 tapestry needle * approximate size body s height is 7cm 2 ¾ in and with ears up 12cm 4 ½ in the width of the body is 5cm 2 in if you are planning to use a different yarn brand or type use a hook size at least 0 5mm less than suggested on the yarn label to create tight stitches * instructions are written in english and expressed in us crochet terms * for more details and the pattern itself please visit the link amigurumi bunnies 4 feel free to contact me with any questions you may have **please have in mind ** * you may not copy resell translate post on the internet or redistribute fully or partially this pattern * mass production and internet sales of finished items based on this pattern are not allowed if you are interested in doing so please contact me thanks for looking tam blog toma creations 5 1 http //coffeeandcream2010 blogspot com/2010/02/catnip-bunnies html 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/catnip-bunny 3 http //www ravelry com/designers/selina-kyle 4 https //tomacreations wordpress com/2015/07/14/free-pattern-amigurumi-bunnies/ 5 https //tomacreations wordpress com/
